content:
PropertyEntry Class

Definition

Represents the data of a property for a selected item and enables editing of this property with type-specific data.

In this Article

public abstract class PropertyEntry : System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget, System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Inheritance
System.Object
PropertyEntry

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Constructors

PropertyEntry()

Creates a new instance of the PropertyEntry class.

protected PropertyEntry ();

PropertyEntry(PropertyValue)

Creates a new instance of the PropertyEntry class that serves as a subproperty of the specified PropertyValue.

protected PropertyEntry (System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue parentValue);
parentValue
PropertyValue

The parent PropertyValue.

Remarks

For host infrastructure derived classes.

Properties

CategoryName

Gets the name of the category in which this property resides.

public abstract string CategoryName { get; }
Value
String

A String that contains the name of the category.

Description

Gets the description of the encapsulated property.

public abstract string Description { get; }
Value
String

A string that contains the description.

DisplayName

Gets the display name for the PropertyEntry.

public virtual string DisplayName { get; }
Value
String

A string that contains the display name.

HasStandardValues

Gets a value that indicates whether a set of standard values is available for this PropertyEntry.

protected virtual bool HasStandardValues { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if a set of standard values is available; otherwise, false.

IsAdvanced

Gets a value that indicates whether the PropertyEntry is custom-made.

public abstract bool IsAdvanced { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the property entry is custom-made; otherwise, false.

IsReadOnly

Gets a value that indicates whether the PropertyEntry is read-only.

public abstract bool IsReadOnly { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the property entry is read-only; otherwise, false.

MatchesFilter

Gets a value that indicates whether the IPropertyFilterTarget matches the filter. Sets the value to indicate that the IPropertyFilterTarget matches the filter and fires the event handler method for the property change.

public bool MatchesFilter { get; protected set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the target object matches the filter; otherwise, false.

Remarks

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> listens to changes made to this property.

ParentValue

Gets the parent PropertyValue in classes derived from a host infrastructure.

public System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue ParentValue { get; }
Value
PropertyValue

A parent PropertyValue.

Remarks

This is used only for subproperties, so its value can be null.

PropertyName

Gets the name of the property.

public abstract string PropertyName { get; }
Value
String

A string that contains the property name.

PropertyType

Gets the type of the property.

public abstract Type PropertyType { get; }
Value
Type

A type that contains the type of the property.

PropertyValue

Gets the PropertyValue for this PropertyEntry.

public System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue PropertyValue { get; }
Value
PropertyValue

A PropertyValue object.

PropertyValueEditor

Gets the PropertyValueEditor that is used for editing the value of this PropertyEntry.

public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor PropertyValueEditor { get; }
Value
PropertyValueEditor

A PropertyValueEditor object that contains the current editor.

StandardValues

Gets a set of possible values supported by this stem.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.

public abstract System.Collections.ICollection StandardValues { get; }
Value
ICollection

An ICollection of possible values.

Methods

ApplyFilter(PropertyFilter)

Stores whether the target property value matches a specified PropertyFilter.

public virtual void ApplyFilter (System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter filter);
filter
PropertyFilter

The PropertyFilter to apply.

CreatePropertyValueInstance()

Enables the host infrastructure to create a new host-specific PropertyValue instance.

protected abstract System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue CreatePropertyValueInstance ();
Returns
PropertyValue

A new PropertyValue object.

MatchesPredicate(PropertyFilterPredicate)

Implementation of a IPropertyFilterTarget method that determines whether the target display or type name matches the specified string containing the name of a filter.

public virtual bool MatchesPredicate (System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate predicate);
predicate
PropertyFilterPredicate

The String display or type name of a filter to match against the target object.

Returns
Boolean

true if the target display or type name matches the specified string; otherwise, false.

OnFilterApplied(PropertyFilter)

Raises the FilterApplied event.

protected virtual void OnFilterApplied (System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter filter);
filter
PropertyFilter

The PropertyFilter to apply.

OnPropertyChanged(PropertyChangedEventArgs)

Raises the INotifyPropertyChanged PropertyChanged event.

protected virtual void OnPropertyChanged (System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs e);
e
PropertyChangedEventArgs

The EventArgs for this event.

OnPropertyChanged(String)

Raises the INotifyPropertyChanged event when the stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer hears that the PropertyValue has changed.

protected virtual void OnPropertyChanged (string propertyName);
propertyName
String

The name of the property whose value has changed.

Events

FilterApplied

Declaration of the IPropertyFilterTarget event, which occurs when a PropertyFilter is changed through a call to the stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.ApplyFilter* method.

public event EventHandler<System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterAppliedEventArgs> FilterApplied;

PropertyChanged

Declaration of the INotifyPropertyChanged event, which occurs when a property value changes.

public event System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;
